text: The San Antonio Rampage are an American professional ice hockey team that began playing in 2002. They currently play in the American Hockey League and are the farm team of the Phoenix Coyotes of the NHL. They play their home games in San Antonio, Texas at the AT&T; Center. Their ECHL affiliate team is the Las Vegas Wranglers. ==Other websites== *San Antonio Rampage's Official Site Category:American Hockey League teams Category:Arizona Coyotes Category:Ice hockey teams in the United States Category:Sports in San Antonio, Texas Category:2002 establishments in the United States Category:2000s establishments in Texas
title: San Antonio Rampage
